articles.title: ‘Didn’t look good…': Tamim stunningly criticises own captain for Sodhi incident - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Tamim Iqbal surprisingly criticised his own captain after Bangladesh decided to recall Ish Sodhi after running him out at non-striker's end. | Cricket
articles.content: The practice of running out batters at the non-striker's end has long been a divisive issue in world cricket. On Saturday, an incident involving Bangladesh bowler Hasan Mahmud and New Zealand's Ish S… [+2841 chars]
